alert.note: Alert for Ashley (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 9:12PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ashley County in southeastern Arkansas and northwestern Morehouse Parishes through 1015 PM CST... At 911 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Hebron to 7 miles south of Huttig. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Beekman around 945 PM CST. Galion around 955 PM CST. Jones around 1005 PM CST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Mer Rouge, Bonita and Blanchton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CST for southeastern Arkansas...and northeastern Louisiana.
